Header: This Minerva Story is of LSP16814, a slide with tissue from a patient with glioblastoma into which a microdevice was inserted.

Waypoints.Name: Introduction
Waypoints.Description: This Minerva Story is of LSP16814, a slide with tissue from a patient with glioblastoma into which a microdevice was inserted.

Waypoints.Name: Cell Populations
Waypoints.Description: This set of markers shows different cell populations -- SOX2+ tumor cells in yellow, CD31+ endothelial cells in red, and CD45+ immune cells in green.

Waypoints.Name: Cell States
Waypoints.Description: This set of markers shows different cell states, with Ki67+ proliferating cells in magenta and gH2AX+ cells with DNA damage in green.
